pull.title: wallet: Exit SyncMetaData if there are no transactions to sync
pull.body:
Instead of crash with an assertion error, simply exit the function `SyncMetaData` if there is no metadata to sync.

Fixes #13110.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.message:
wallet: Exit SyncMetaData if there are no transactions to sync

Instead of crash with an assertion error, simply exit the function
`SyncMetaData` if there is no metadata to sync.

Fixes #13110.
